about_the_game:
Welcome to the a e s t h e t i c universe of The Galaxy Rider! Step into the ship of a space taxi driver and embark on a unique cosmic adventure. In this thrilling game set against a backdrop of dazzling Synthwave aesthetics, you'll pilot your sleek spaceship across the cosmos. Your mission? Transport passengers between planets in an exciting journey that's out of this world. Buckle up for an intergalactic ride like no other!



In The Galaxy Rider, you're not just a player – you're the captain of your very own cosmic spaceship!!! As you drive your spaceship through the vastness of space, you'll find yourself traversing a variety of stunning planets.

The fast-paced gameplay is augmented by the Synthwave soundtrack that accompanies your every move. As you weave through asteroid fields, glide over alien landscapes, and navigate wormholes, the music will have you feeling like you're living in a retro-futuristic dreamscape.

The Galaxy Rider isn't just a game; it's an escape into a world of neon and nostalgia, where every moment is an opportunity for adventure. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the cosmos, this game offers excitement, challenge, and a heavy dose of retro charm.

So, are you ready to become the ultimate space taxi driver? Prepare for a journey that will have you blasting through galaxies, picking up and dropping off passengers, and carving your name among the stars!!!! Wishlist and follow The Galaxy Rider now and discover the future of intergalactic travel!

name: The Galaxy Rider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any CPU released after 2018 should be good enough
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should work
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 is waaaaay more than enough
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Prepare for some interstellar synths.
